name: MoveFileSystemEntry
description:
Moves a file system entry to a new location within the project.

Use this tool to relocate a file or directory within a specified project in Datadog’s file system. It should be called when you need to change the location of a file system entry.

parameters.name: file_system_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the file system to be moved within the project.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this file system.

parameters.name: target_project_id
parameters.description: The Project ID of the target project where the file system entry will be moved. Obtain this ID from the /api/projects/ endpoint if necessary.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: file_system_entry_details
parameters.description: Details of the file system entry to move, including its ID, path, and type.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this file system.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this file system.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
